name: Word Linker - a crossword game
description:
Simple but fun crossword game!

Word Linker is a free word connect game. It is combines word search and crossword game's feature.
Simply connect letters in the level to finish a word, and fill all search words into crossword blank to complete the level.

How to play Word Connect?
- Connect the letters to get a correct word.
- Find all the words and fill in the crossword blanks.

Feature of Word Link!
- Simple Rules, easy to play.
- Over 2000 unique levels, be a word genuis in our training!
- Crossword style to make the game experience even more interesting.
- No time limit, adjust your pace at any level
- Play offline! No wifi required

Maybe the best Word Games! Download and enjoy this word link game!
